desc: <span class='help-method'>PLS regression PLSRegression implements the PLS 2 blocks regression known as PLS2 or PLS1 in case of one dimensional response. This class inherits from _PLS with mode=”A”, deflation_mode=”regression”,norm_y_weights=False and algorithm=”nipals.
